definition: flawless piece of jade/(fig.) perfect person or thing/virgin/to return sth intact
lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner

sentences.english: “Most of the pieces that were stolen from the National Museum will come back,” Mr. Zubaidi said.
sentences.chinese: 国家博物馆的大多数被劫文物都会完璧归赵。

sentences.english: The price of operation is the safe return of Scylla.
sentences.chinese: 手术的代价是把锡拉完璧归赵。

sentences.english: You can rest assured that those two articles will be returned to you in perfect condition shortly.
sentences.chinese: 你放心，你那两件东西不久就会完璧归赵。

sentences.english: But it is not flawless and not quiet well done in using quotations .
sentences.chinese: 但是并非就是一块毫无瑕疵的完璧。

definition: return (a borrowed object) with thanks/decline (a gift) with thanks
lit. pick orchids and present peonies (idiom); fig. presents between lovers
to be ridiculous/to make a fool of oneself
variant of 無動於衷|无动于衷[wu2 dong4 yu2 zhong1]
(of a girl) to lose one's virginity/to deflower a virgin/to reach the age of 16/(of a man) to reach the age of 64
lit. the fairy is willing, but King Xiang doesn't dream (idiom)/(said of a woman's unrequited love)
pinyin: shen2 nu:3 you3 xin1 , Xiang1 Wang2 wu2 meng4
